post.body: Morning!
For certain values of back. :) Should totally take a nap. Or lay down for an hour or so.
Do. It.
Could, yeah. I've been really vague about where Shiro is for just this sort of reason.
Ooh, lovely. Really. *hugs*
Oh, hell. Dick could write that one to Bruce. Jono...umm...*pokes some more*
Hmm. *pokes characters* Actually, I think only Angie could write a love letter over there.
*hugs* Thanks.
... I have updates to do. I may steal that idea. Even if some of them can't actually send them. And, well, one doesn't have one
*hugs back*
Morning! In some neck of the woods.
Thanks, hon. You wouldn't believe how much that helps right now.
Planning on it. Believe me, so planning on it.
Thanks, hon. I'm tired and still a bit upset. Mamma Mia! set me off on the plane.
*hugs* Thanks. Exhausting, though.
@dea_liberty I KNOW. I had much the same reaction!
All rightie. I'm off to bed, finally. We'll see how long it lasts. G'night all!
Oooh. Pages from the Storm Front comic adaptation on scans_daily. *goes to read*
Well. So much for twittering while I was gone. No internet. But. Am home and safe. If feeling slightly icky at the moment.
Time to head off. I'll do my best to Twitter and let people know I'm in safe. Later all!
